text: Anata gata shinkō suru mono yo, arrā wa anata gata no te matawa yari de karu, chottoshita emono ni yotte, anata gata o kokoromi rareru. Sore wa arrā ga, miru koto no dekinai kare o osoreru mono ga, daredearu ka o shira reru tamedearu. Kono ato demo ihan suru mono wa, itamashī chōbatsu o ukerudearou
